title: Is there ANY way to go back o the old client?
body: I lag so badly that I only get about 10 seconds to ban a champion because the rest is lag spikes and the last 20 seconds after champs are chosen re too laggy for me to change my runes or masteries last bbit of time.

replies.body:
You can return to the legacy client!  Try one of these two steps:

-  On the login screen of the open beta updated client, look for the "Launch Legacy Client" text at the bottom.
-  Or create a shortcut directly to the legacy client in your League Installation. Just look for "lol.launcher"

Be sure to report your feedback over at the [client discussion](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/alpha-client-discussion) boards as well for our client devs.  Hope that helps!

> [{quoted}](name=Porocles,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=u7dZMgIj,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2016-11-26T22:09:40.135+0000)
>
> You can return to the legacy client!  Try one of these two steps:
> 
> -  On the login screen of the open beta updated client, look for the "Launch Legacy Client" text at the bottom.
> -  Or create a shortcut directly to the legacy client in your League Installation. Just look for "lol.launcher"
> 
> Be sure to report your feedback over at the [client discussion](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/alpha-client-discussion) boards as well for our client devs.  Hope that helps!

 thanks!
